attributes.action: Mandatory 10-year sentence for possession of a knife
attributes.additional_details: We believe this could help reduce knife crime.
attributes.background: We want the law to be changed so that if you found guilty of illegal possession of a knife, you receive a mandatory 10-year sentence.
